name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Aaron BROWN, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Aaron BROWN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of July, 2007, the Petition for Leave to File an Allocatur Petition Nunc Pro Tunc is granted. Petitioner is directed to file a petition for allowance of appeal within forty-five (45) days of the date of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
929 A.2d 634
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Aaron BROWN, Petitioner.
No. 84 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 17, 2007.
